featured.text: 27 on the videos sit in bars, nightclubs, and roadhouses.
When photographing zoo animals, don’t get too close to the cages, and never tap on the glass or throw things between the bars of a cage.

definition.zh_def: 一種長條形的物體，通常用於支撐或阻擋，或指酒吧等社交場所。
definition.en_def: A long, rigid piece of material used for support or as a barrier, or a place where alcoholic beverages are served.
definition.example: We met at the bar for drinks after work.
